text: Ali Mirzaei (, 28 January 1929 â€“ 18 July 2020) was an Iranian weightlifter. He competed in the 1952 Summer Olympics, winning a bronze medal. He was born in Tehran. He also competed at the 1951 and 1954 World Weightlifting Championships. He also participated at the Asian Games in 1951. Mirzaei died on 18 July 2020 in Tehran, aged 91. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Iranian weightlifters Category:Olympians for Iran Category:Olympic bronze medalists Category:Sportspeople from Tehran Category:Medalists at the 1952 Summer Olympics
title: Ali Mirzaei
